remarks: The span of an orthocomplement equals the orthocomplement of the span. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dochsp.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochsp.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsp.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsp.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochsp.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dochsp.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochsp.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) $.
dochspocN $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) = ( ._|_ ` ( N ` X ) ) ) $.
